question: Periyar, whose death anniversary was observed in Tamil Nadu recently, is best known for which movement?
explanation: Periyar, also known as the Father of the Dravidian Movement, is best known for his Self-respect Movement. He had initiated the movement for achieving socio-political equality for the socially backward classes in the southern states. He is also known for his Vaikom Satyagraha that was organised in Kerala.
